subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Dan Halem, Major League Baseball’s chief legal officer and new drug czar, said that the league recognized the problem with stanozolol and for years had been trying to tackle it.
snippet: Dan Halem, Major League Baseball’s chief legal officer and new drug czar, said that the league recognized the problem with stanozolol and for years had been trying to tackle it.
